agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 23, 2019 PLACE: E1.010 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 214 Reynolds Relating to the dissemination of information about historically underutilized businesses and the expansion of the small business development center network. HB 1822 Neave | et al. Relating to the definition of "employer" for purposes of a sexual harassment claim. HB 3739 Goldman Relating to including certain child care providers in the Texas Rising Star Program and establishing a pilot program to expand participation in the Texas Rising Star Program. HB 3876 Deshotel Relating to the creation of a work group to advise the Texas Workforce Commission regarding the Texas Rising Star Program. HB 3916 Deshotel Relating to a competitive and integrated employment initiative for certain Medicaid recipients. HB 4286 Davis, Yvonne Relating to the regulation of child-care providers by the Texas Workforce Commission. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
